Ammunition

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Item Creation Process: Crafting · Design · Fabrication · Materials · Production
Design Types: Tools · Clothing and Jewelery · Containers


Ammunition is used mainly by Bows and Crossbows, these weapons cannot be used without ammunition to throw. Ammunition should not be confused with Thrown Weapons. Ammunition generally has 3 main components, any 2 of which are required; a shaft, fletching, and a head. While arrows generally have all three, some ammunition dispenses with one or more parts. For example, arrows and crossbows bolts can dispense with either the head or fletching component, while blowgun darts rarely have shafts.

Contents

  • 1 Design Components
    • 1.1 Shaft
    • 1.2 Head
    • 1.3 Fletching
    • 1.4 Optional
  • 2 Base Stats

Design Components

Shaft

This component generally determines the type of ammunition being created by its length. The type of Shaft used determines the type of Head and Fletching which can be used.

Head

If the weapon has no Shaft, the Head determines the type of weapon that it is used with.

Fletching

Optional

Other things can be used to supplement or treat the base components or add additional features to the ammunition.

Base Stats

  • Heft equal the weight of the component materials.
  • Quality is 100%.
  • Durability equal to one percent of (100 minus average Malleability of components) divided by 4 and rounded down.
  • Size equal to the components.
  • Weight equals component's weight.
  • Base Damage is ten percent of Weight times five percent of (101 minus the weapon's Malleability).
